SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.osgi.cdi.api.extension.annotation
Annotation Type Publish

@Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Publish

This annotation notices that this type is an OSGi service implementation and should be automatically published in the OSGi service registry.

It allows to specify:

  • The contract interfaces of implemented service, as an optional array of Classes,

  • The properties of the published service implementation, as an optional array of Property,

The published implementation might be discriminated using regular Qualifier annotations or a LDAP filter with Filter annotation.

Author:
Mathieu ANCELIN - SERLI (mathieu.ancelin@serli.com), Matthieu CLOCHARD - SERLI (matthieu.clochard@serli.com)
See Also:
Qualifier, Filter, Property, Service, ServiceRegistry

Optional Element Summary
 Class[] contracts
          The contracts the annotated class fulfills.
 Property[] properties
          The properties of the annotated class as OSGi service properties (for LDAP filtering).
 

contracts

public abstract Class[] contracts
The contracts the annotated class fulfills.

Returns:
the contracts of the annotated implementation as an array of interfaces.
Default:
{}

properties

public abstract Property[] properties
The properties of the annotated class as OSGi service properties (for LDAP filtering).

Returns:
the properties of the service implementation as an array of Property.
Default:
{}
